crash.title: Kartik Crash Reporter
crash.head: Kartik stopped working
crash.intro: Kartik encountered a problem and exited unexpectedly. We recorded some additional information, and a crash report has been automatically sent to the developers if you were connected to the Internet.
report: Alternately, a crash report has been created in «
», so that you can send it to the developers when you will have Internet access.

warn: Download the new version of Kartik from the official website to get the newest features and bug fixes.

intro: Heyo, what about a lil race?
Hey, you're back! What 'bout a lil race?
Shall we do a lil race?
won2: As if I hadn't told you!
wall1: Well then, you don't drive well?
start: You'll see, I'll make you one of those races!
You'll tell me what ya think

descriptions: Play alone and offline against a robot
Play with a friend on one screen
Close the game and return to

settings.title: Settings
settings.notice: Changed settings won't apply until you restart Kartik

menu.dlocal: Play with a friend on the same computer
menu.donline: Play with a friend on different computers

intro.pcreate: Give this code to your teammate so they can connect to your party:
intro.pjoin: Enter the code your teammate gave to connect to their party:

online.aborted: The other player ended the game

items.results.wins: Number of games that you won
items.results.loses: Number of games that you lost

polymer.logging: We are logging you in ; check for your Web browser window and accept the login.
polymer.loginClose: You can now close this tab/window and go back to Kartik.
polymer.gatheringLogin: We are checking your account ; this may take a while.
error: You won't be able to use Kartik Online until we can connect to the servers.
updateError: We cannot check for new updates right now, please try again later.
levelup: and you're gaining power! Continue and try to reach the maximum level.
finished: Finished Kartik?! Yes. You've reached the god level!
token: You have been logged out from Kartik Online because your session has been terminated from somewhere else.
